lead_paragraph: A federal judge declared a same-sex marriage ban in deeply conservative Texas unconstitutional on Wednesday, but will allow the nation's second-most populous state to enforce the law pending an appeal that will likely go to the U.S. Supreme Court.

headline.main: Texas Gay Marriage Ban Latest to Be Struck Down
headline.print_headline: Texas Gay Marriage Ban Latest to Be Struck Down

snippet: A federal judge declared a same-sex marriage ban in deeply conservative Texas unconstitutional on Wednesday, but will allow the nation's second-most populous state to enforce the law pending an appeal that will likely go to the U.S. Supreme Court....
